Build-Depends: automake (>= 1:1.12), bison, debhelper (>= 10), flex, gtk-doc-tools, libcairo2-dev, libdrm-dev (>= 2.4.75), libkmod-dev, libpciaccess-dev (>= 0.10), libprocps-dev, libudev-dev, libunwind-dev, libxrandr-dev, libxv-dev, peg, pkg-config, python-docutils, quilt, x11proto-dri2-dev, xutils-dev (>= 1:7.6+6)
